ToggleButton
===========================

.. automodule:: wblenderstylewidget.components.widgets.button
   :members: ToggleButton
   :exclude-members: innerSetting, enterEvent, leaveEvent, mousePressEvent, mouseReleaseEvent, update_Qss
   :undoc-members: innerSetting
   :show-inheritance:

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - ATTRIBUTES
     - Type
     - Description
   * - ``backgroundColor``
     - string
     - The name of the currently selected color. This is used to set the button's background color.
   * - ``hoverColor``
     - string
     - Indicates the hover color of the button.
   * - ``pressColor``
     - string
     - Indicates the press color of the button.
   * - ``toggled``
     - boolean
     - Indicates whether the button is in a toggled state.
   * - ``toggleBackgroundColor``
     - string
     - The name of the color used when the button is toggled. This is used to set the button's background color.
   * - ``toggleHoverColor``
     - string
     - Indicates the hover color of the button when toggled.
   * - ``togglePressColor``
     - string
     - Indicates the press color of the button when toggled.
